resources.string: Tap to Add a New Image.
Please fill out the form to begin Questing!

LifeQuest is task list application that tries to make everyday tasks fun again! Enter in Quests to gather Experience points to build your LifeQuest Level. Don\'t forget to check out Achievements to see how you\'re doing, and if you\'re good enough to get the Platnium Achievement.

\t\tHome is your one stop shop to seeing how much Life you have Quested. Right off the bat, you are told how productive you are via your big blue level. Next you\'ll notice under it are your top three most recent Quests. Try to complete as many Quests to progress to the next Life Level!! Looking for more to do? No fear, swipe the left side of the screen to move to other pages and continue questing.

\t\tQuests are how you increase your life level, without them you\'d be doing chores like any other guy. You\'re better than that! Choose to View your Quests by swiping the navigation bar and selecting \"View Quests\", you will see a list of everything remaining on your Journey. When you\'re ready, simply click on a Quest to view its information and either quit the Quest, or Finish to claim your Bounty.

\t\tIf Quests are how you progress, then you probably need to create one first! No problem, we have you covered. You can either open the navigation drawer and choose \"Create Quest\" or tap the + button at the top right corner. Now you can add an Image, set your task name, and how many hours. You may notice that we calculate your location, we\'re nice like that, and once you\'ve filled each field we also calculate your Quest XP worth. The easier the Quest, the less the XP, and vice versa, so what are you doing? Get out there are start Questing!

\t\tAchievements are a list of all the crazy things you have done in LifeQuest. It can be accessed at anytime by swiping the navigation drawer open and tapping \"Achievements\". From there you\'ll see the achievements clever names, descriptions, and the trophy type if you were a good enough Quester to complete them. It\'s always good practice to check out the achievements to see how to get them! You may have a high LifeQuest Level, but are you good enough to earn the infamous platnium achievement?
